r.d: The GraphViz class allows for the creation of and the work with directed and undirected graphs and their visualization with AT&T's GraphViz tools.
r.n: QA release SVN dir layout Request #12913 Error report upon renderDotFile error Bug #15019 addCluster using attributes twice Request #15943 adding subgraph to subgraph? Request #15943 adding subgraph to subgraph? Bug #16326 image() doesn't return error on unknown format. Bug #16569 Image_GraphViz uses @package GraphViz Bug #16872 Cluster display Bug #17746 Nested Clusters not working
